amendment.description: To protect, restore, and enhance fish, wildlife, and associated habitats of certain lakes and rivers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 142 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 142 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To protect, restore, and enhance fish, wildlife, and associated habitats of certain lakes and rivers.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 142 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 142 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reid.
